channel.title: Ramble on Rambling Reece
channel.description: Recent content in Ramble on Rambling Reece

item.title: ECMAScript 2015 (ES6)(JavaScript-ish) is here, time to use it
item.description: It’s true, the title of this post is a little odd. But then, the history of JavaScript is too. Recently I have been trying to get a better understanding of the web technologies out there and how I can use them within the CRM or standalone projects. This has inevitably led me to the realisation that I am woefully out of date.I will not discuss the history of JavaScript and ECMAScript here as you can find out more at the linked wikipedia articles; the point is that ECMAScript is the standard that JavaScript tracks.
